test.name: DateTimeDifferenceYear
test.expression: difference in years between DateTime(2000) and DateTime(2005, 12)

test.name: DateTimeDifferenceMonth
test.expression: difference in months between DateTime(2000, 2) and DateTime(2000, 10)

test.name: DateTimeDifferenceDay
test.expression: difference in days between DateTime(2000, 10, 15, 10, 30) and DateTime(2000, 10, 25, 10, 0)

test.name: DateTimeDifferenceHour
test.expression: difference in hours between DateTime(2000, 4, 1, 12) and DateTime(2000, 4, 1, 20)

test.name: DateTimeDifferenceMinute
test.expression: difference in minutes between DateTime(2005, 12, 10, 5, 16) and DateTime(2005, 12, 10, 5, 25)

test.name: DateTimeDifferenceSecond
test.expression: difference in seconds between DateTime(2000, 10, 10, 10, 5, 45) and DateTime(2000, 10, 10, 10, 5, 50)

test.name: DateTimeDifferenceMillisecond
test.expression: difference in milliseconds between DateTime(2000, 10, 10, 10, 5, 45, 500, -6.0) and DateTime(2000, 10, 10, 10, 5, 45, 900, -7.0)

test.name: DateTimeDifferenceWeeks
test.expression: difference in weeks between DateTime(2000, 10, 15) and DateTime(2000, 10, 28)

test.name: DateTimeDifferenceWeeks2
test.expression: difference in weeks between DateTime(2000, 10, 15) and DateTime(2000, 10, 29)

test.name: DateTimeDifferenceNegative
test.expression: difference in years between DateTime(2016) and DateTime(1998)

test.name: DateTimeDifferenceUncertain
test.expression: difference in months between DateTime(2005) and DateTime(2006, 7) > 5

test.name: DifferenceInHoursAA
test.expression: difference in hours between DateTime(2017, 3, 12, 1, 0, 0, 0, -7.0) and DateTime(2017, 3, 12, 3, 0, 0, 0, -6.0)

test.name: DifferenceInMinutesAA
test.expression: difference in minutes between DateTime(2017, 11, 5, 1, 30, 0, 0, -6.0) and DateTime(2017, 11, 5, 1, 15, 0, 0, -7.0)

test.name: DifferenceInDaysAA
test.expression: difference in days between DateTime(2017, 3, 12, 0, 0, 0, 0, -7.0) and DateTime(2017, 3, 13, 0, 0, 0, 0, -6.0)

test.name: DateTimeDurationBetweenUncertainAdd
test.expression: (days between DateTime(2014, 1, 15) and DateTime(2014, 2)) + (days between DateTime(2014, 1, 15) and DateTime(2014, 2))

test.name: DateTimeDurationBetweenUncertainSubtract
test.expression: (days between DateTime(2014, 1, 15) and DateTime(2014, 2)) - (months between DateTime(2005) and DateTime(2006, 5))

test.name: DateTimeDurationBetweenUncertainMultiply
test.expression: (days between DateTime(2014, 1, 15) and DateTime(2014, 2)) * (days between DateTime(2014, 1, 15) and DateTime(2014, 2))

test.name: DateTimeDurationBetweenUncertainDiv
test.expression: (days between DateTime(2014, 1, 15) and DateTime(2014, 2)) div (months between DateTime(2005) and DateTime(2006, 5))

test.name: DateTimeSameOrAfterYearTrue1
test.expression: DateTime(2014) same year or after DateTime(2014)

test.name: DateTimeSameOrAfterYearTrue2
test.expression: DateTime(2016) same year or after DateTime(2014)

test.name: DateTimeSameOrAfterYearFalse
test.expression: DateTime(2013) same year or after DateTime(2014)

test.expression: DateTime(2014, 12) same month or after DateTime(2014, 12)

test.name: DateTimeSameOrAfterNull1
test.expression: DateTime(2014, 12, 20) same day or after DateTime(2014, 12)
